# statmisc

<!-- badges: start -->
<!-- badges: end -->

A collection of convenient utility functions for statistical data analaysis and data-cleaning.

## Installation

You can install the development version of `statmisc` from [GitHub](https://github.com/) with:

``` r
# install.packages("pak")
pak::pak("StatGenCore/statmisc")
```
